name: Traffic Jam VR
description:
Uh oh, the lights are out for your favorite neighborhood intersection (who doesn't have a favorite intersection). To save some lives, you have to get out and save the day! You just weren't expecting the many surprises to arrive at this intersection.

Devices: This zip provides the exports for both HTC Vive and Google Daydream. 

Directions: Point your hand at a lane to tell it to stop. Once you move your hand away cars will begin to go after 3 seconds. You can also summon cars to go immediately to move by pointing at the lane and clicking (action button on daydream, click throttle on vive). 

Try to avoid crashes for as long as possible! 

Developers: Corey Greenwald, Jonathan Tan

Design: Jonadab Oomon, Anna Zhang, Rag Kandala, Jonathan Albert
